title: Kimagure To Amagami
sinopse:
Within the model business world, Miike (a model) and Ikumi (his editor) establish a professional relationship, but what happens when Miike starts feeling something else for his taciturn and reserved editor?

(Source: Seraphic Deviltry)

Included one-shots: Ichi ni Tsuite, Yoru to Urahara
